DOCNAME: CASE OF HORVATH AND OTHERS v. HUNGARY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants are CARDINAL NORP nationals and CARDINAL NORP companies ( see list in GPE ) .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicants brought an official liability action against the GPE . ORG held several hearings and obtained the opinions of experts . It stayed the procedure for altogether DATE and DATE pending the successions of CARDINAL plaintiffs who had died in the meantime .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG gave judgment . On DATE ORG quashed this decision and remitted the case .

CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings , several hearings took place and the opinion of an expert was obtained . According to the information in the case file , the case is still pending before the first - instance court .
